designSystem.name: Jokup Design System
designSystem.philosophy: A modern, vibrant party game interface with neon aesthetics, dark theme, and playful energy. The design balances futuristic cyberpunk vibes with approachable, fun interactions.

primary.description: Primary purple neon color - used for main accents, borders, and glow effects

secondary.description: Cyan accent color - used for highlights, hover states, and gradient combinations

background.description: Dark purple gradient background with semi-transparent panels using backdrop blur

text.description: High contrast white for primary text, soft purple-tinted white for secondary text

gradients.description: Diagonal gradients for buttons and interactive elements, radial for backgrounds

overlays.description: Very subtle white overlays for depth, semi-transparent borders for definition

fontFamily.description: Modern, clean sans-serif with excellent readability

h2.usage: Primary action buttons, major section headers

padding.description: Generous padding for breathing room, responsive scaling

gap.description: Consistent gaps for grid layouts and flex containers

borderRadius.description: Generous rounding for modern, friendly appearance. Large radius for main containers, medium for cards and buttons

glow.description: Neon glow effects - primary purple for general elements, cyan for interactive states

inset.description: Subtle inset shadows for depth when needed

backdropBlur.usage: Applied to panel backgrounds for glassmorphism effect

transitions.description: Smooth, quick transitions for interactive elements

hover.description: Subtle lift effect on hover for buttons and cards

grid.description: Two-column layout for desktop (brand/actions), single column for mobile

maxWidth.description: Centered container with max-width for readability

logo.description: Gradient background with emoji icon, strong glow effect

primary.description: Large, bold primary action button with gradient and strong glow

secondary.description: Subtle card-style buttons with border and glow on hover

card.description: Glassmorphic cards with subtle background, bordered, interactive hover states

panel.description: Main container panels with glassmorphism effect

visualHierarchy.description: Use size, weight, and color to create clear hierarchy. Largest elements are most important actions.
rules: Primary actions use largest text (30px+) and boldest weight (900)
Secondary actions use medium text (18px) and medium weight (600)
Supporting text uses smaller sizes (14-20px) with muted colors

neonAesthetics.description: Neon glow effects are signature to this design. Use strategically for emphasis and interactivity.
rules: Primary glow: rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.35) for general elements
Accent glow: rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.45) for interactive states
Hover glow: Increase intensity to 0.7 for active states
Apply glow to: buttons, logo, main panels, hover states

glassmorphism.description: Semi-transparent panels with backdrop blur create depth and modern aesthetic.
rules: Panel backgrounds: rgba(25, 15, 60, 0.75) with backdrop-filter: blur(16px)
Card backgrounds: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04) for subtle depth
Always combine transparency with backdrop blur for proper effect

gradientUsage.description: Gradients add energy and visual interest. Use for primary actions and brand elements.
rules: Primary gradient (purple to cyan): buttons, logo, key interactive elements
Background gradient (radial): full page backgrounds
Gradients should always flow from purple (#8b5cf6) to cyan (#22d3ee) at 135deg

interactivity.description: All interactive elements should provide clear feedback through hover states.
rules: Hover: translateY(-2px to -3px) for lift effect
Hover: Change border color to accent cyan (#22d3ee)
Hover: Increase glow intensity
Transitions: 0.12s-0.15s ease for smooth feel

spacing.description: Generous spacing creates breathing room and premium feel.
rules: Container padding: 48px desktop, 36px tablet, 20px mobile
Section gaps: 48px for major sections, 28-32px for related content
Card padding: 22px minimum for comfortable content
Button padding: 28px for primary, 22px for secondary

typography.description: Bold, clear typography with strong hierarchy.
rules: Use Inter font family for consistency
Weight 900 for primary actions and hero text
Weight 600 for secondary actions and labels
Uppercase with letter-spacing for taglines
Line height 1.6 for body text readability

colorContrast.description: Maintain high contrast for accessibility while preserving neon aesthetic.
rules: Primary text: #f9fafb on dark backgrounds (high contrast)
Muted text: #c7d2fe for secondary information
Interactive elements: Use accent cyan (#22d3ee) for visibility
Always ensure WCAG AA compliance for text readability

responsiveDesign.description: Design scales gracefully from desktop to mobile.
rules: Breakpoint at 1000px: Switch to single column layout
Breakpoint at 520px: Reduce padding and font sizes
Maintain same visual style across all sizes
Touch targets: Minimum 44px for mobile interactions

consistency.description: Maintain consistent patterns across all components.
rules: All cards use same border radius (18px), padding (22px), and hover effects
All buttons follow primary or secondary button patterns
All panels use same glassmorphism treatment
Glow effects use consistent color and intensity patterns

whenToUseGradients: Primary action buttons (Start Game, Submit, etc.)
Key interactive elements that need emphasis
whenToUseGlow: All interactive elements (buttons, cards, menu items)

colorSelection.primary: Use neon purple (#8b5cf6) for main brand elements and borders
colorSelection.accent: Use cyan (#22d3ee) for highlights, hover states, and interactive feedback
colorSelection.background: Always use dark gradient background for depth
colorSelection.text: Use white (#f9fafb) for primary text, muted purple (#c7d2fe) for secondary

contrast.primaryText: High contrast white on dark backgrounds

focusStates.description: All interactive elements must have visible focus indicators
focusStates.style: Use accent cyan glow or outline for focus states

touchTargets.description: Ensure all interactive elements meet minimum touch target size on mobile
